![Waibu Web Framework](static/logo.png)

Waibu Web Framework

## Applications

- [Multi Page Application - waibu-mpa](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-mpa)
- [REST Api Framework - waibu-rest-api](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-rest-api)
- [Static Resource - waibu-static](https://ardhi.github.io/waibu-static)

## Hire Me

If you have a Bajo Framework-based application project and need a professional service or assistance, please <a href="https://github.com/ardhi#pro-service">click here</a>. I'd be happy to work on it at a competitive price and with fast turnaround!
